subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[sober up]]
# to [[awaken]]; to [[wake up]]
# to be [[awake]]
# to [[decant]] (wine, etc.)
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[clever]]; [[intelligent]]; [[sharp]]
